rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to the living area and kitchen.
Open-plan living space with integrated seating area and access to the balcony.
Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area; designed with Brutalist aesthetics in mind using raw materials.
Spacious studio apartment on the ground floor featuring a private balcony.
Functional bathroom serving the studio bedroom and adjacent areas.

openings.description: Balcony door providing access to a private outdoor space.
Large window ensuring natural light and ventilation in compliance with Vastu principles.

external_features.description: A rectangular swimming pool integrated into the backyard area with sufficient spacing and adherence to local norms.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with direct access to a spacious balcony.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony and natural light alignment following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balcony door for private outdoor relaxation.
Balcony door ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
